ignore_qc.prompt:
Do you want to include genomes that did not pass quality control?
default=(n)
>

mfold.prompt:
Delta G threshold for secondary structures in PCR products at 60 degree Celsius calculated by mfold
default=-3.0
>

customdb.prompt:
Do you want to use a custom database for blastn?
Specifiy the absolute filepath of the custom database (e.g. '/blastdb/nontarget.fasta' or '/blastdb/ref_prok_rep_genomes') or hit return to skip, default=None
>

mpprimer.prompt:
Mpprimer threshold for delta G values calculated by MPprimer_dimer_check.pl
default=-3.5
>

exception.prompt:
Primer binding to this non-target species is tolerated.
Provide a species name or hit return to skip:
>

probe.prompt:
Do you want primer3 to design an internal probe? [Experimental!]
(y)es/(n)o, default=(n)
>

nolist.prompt:
Do you want to perform specificity check without the (non-target) species list (for all sequences in the DB)?
Not recommended for nt DB! May be used with a custom DB
default=(n)
>

offline.prompt:
Work offline with local genome assemblies?
(y)es/(n)o, default=(n)
>

virus.prompt:
Do you want to design primers for a virus? 
default=(n)
>

genbank.prompt:
Download genome assemblies from GenBank? 
default=(n)
>

skip_download.prompt:
Skip the download of Genomes from NCBI?
(y)es/(n)o, default=(n)
>

forall.prompt:
Use this value for all targets?
(y)es/(n)o, default=(y)
>

species.prompt: Please specify target species (comma separated) or type help for format examples:

path.prompt: Please specify a path to use as the working directory or hit return to use the current working directory:

mfethreshold.prompt:
MFEprimer threshold for nontarget sequence PPC higher values mean more stringent selection.
default=90
>

blastseqs.prompt:
Set the number of sequences per BLAST search. Decrease the number of sequences if BLAST slows down due to low memory.
options = [100, 500, 1000, 2000, 5000], default=1000
>

qc_gene.prompt:
Gene(s) (comma separated) for BLAST in the initial quality control step.
options: rRNA, tuf, recA, dnaK, pheS, default=rRNA
>

start.prompt:
Create new config files or start pipeline with previously generated files?
type (n)ew or (s)tart, default=(n)ew:

assemblylevel.prompt:
Limit downloads of Genomes to assembly status
options: complete, chromosome, scaffold, contig, all (comma separated), default=all
>

intermediate.prompt:
Do you want to keep intermediate files?
default=(n)
>

targets.prompt: Search for config files for (a)ll or (s)elect targets:

skip_tree.prompt:
Skip the core gene alignment and tree for visualization and troubleshooting.
(y)es/(n)o, default=(n)
>

evalue.prompt:
E-value threshold for BLAST search, all results with a lower value pass. default=10
>

nuc_identity.prompt:
Nucleotide identity threshold for BLAST search, all results with a lower value pass. default=0
>
